name: Havelis and Temples Walk - Jaipur
description: Explore the hidden riches, effervescent tradition and colourful culture of the Pink City. Get marvelled at the old world temples that are architectural marvels and reverberate with Hindu chants. Visit ornate havelis that still echo the beauty of the nobelman’s era. But best of all, interact with the local people, temple persists and talented workmen as the give you a sense of the pulsating land.
